nodes.text: A half-derelict orbital station circled the planet of Saqqar that was located within the Saqqar system of the galaxy's Hutt Space region and lay on the hyperlane called The Dead Road. The space station served the needs of the few starships that traveled along the hyperlane.
The orbital station was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
